panels.description: Particulate counts displayed in log scale

targets.query:
import "math"
from(bucket: "SharedAirDFW")
  |> range(start: -1h, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "IPS7100")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "pm10_0")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device_name"] == "${device_name}")

  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

import "math"
from(bucket: "SharedAirDFW")
  |> range(start: -1h, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "IPS7100")

panels.title: MINTS 24x7 Sentinel: PM Concentration by size

targets.query:
from(bucket: "SharedAirDFW")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device_name"] == "${device_name}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "SCD30")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "c02")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "SharedAirDFW")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device_name"] == "${device_name}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "INA219Duo")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] ==   "powerSolar")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

panels.title: MINTS 24x7 Sentinel: Carbon Dioxide concentration by time

targets.query:
from(bucket: "SharedAirDFW")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "GPSGPGGA2")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "latitudeCoordinate")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device_name"] == "${device_name}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "SharedAirDFW")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "GPSGPGGA2")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "longitudeCoordinate")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device_name"] == "${device_name}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "SharedAirDFW")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "MBC001")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device_name"] == "${device_name}")
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r._value >= ${Confidence})
  |> drop(columns: ["device_id", "device_name"])
  |> count()
  |> group()
  |> sort(desc: true)

  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value * 1000.0}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

panels.description: Particulate counts displayed in log scale

targets.query:
import "math"
from(bucket: "SharedAirDFW")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "IPS7100")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "pc10_0")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device_name"] == "${device_name}")
 
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
     |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: math.log10(x: r._value + 1.0) }))
  |> yield(name: "last")

import "math"
from(bucket: "SharedAirDFW")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
